statements: SELECT * FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets;
SELECT id, strategy_name, budget FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets;
SELECT * FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, budget FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets WHERE campaign_id = 100 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, budget FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets WHERE bidding_strategy = 'CPC' AND budget > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets WHERE budget BETWEEN 1000.00 AND 2000.00 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets GROUP BY strategy_name HAVING total_count > 5;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM bidding_strategies_and_budgets GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_budget > 5000.00;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget_money FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget_money > 5000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget_money FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget_money FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget_money, end_date, campaign_id FROM campaigns WHERE budget_money > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, budget_money, campaign_id FROM campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget_money, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget_money < 5000 AND start_date >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount FROM budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%summer%';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT b.strategy_name, b.bid_amount, c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date FROM bidding_strategies b JOIN campaigns c ON b.strategy_id = c.campaign_id;
SELECT c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, b.bid_amount FROM campaigns c LEFT JOIN bidding_strategies b ON c.campaign_id = b.strategy_id WHERE b.bid_amount > 100;

SELECT c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, b.strategy_name, b.bid_amount FROM campaigns c RIGHT JOIN bidding_strategies b ON c.campaign_id = b.strategy_id WHERE b.target_audience = 'Young Adults';
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, bid_amount FROM ads ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, budget FROM ad_groups WHERE bid_strategy = 'CPC';
SELECT date, impressions, clicks, spend FROM metrics WHERE ad_id = 3 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, bid_amount FROM ads WHERE ad_format = 'video';
SELECT ad_group_name, bid_strategy, budget FROM ad_groups ORDER BY bid_strategy DESC;
SELECT ad_name, spend FROM ads JOIN metrics ON ads.ad_id = metrics.ad_id WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_name, bid, status FROM ads ORDER BY bid DESC;
SELECT group_name, status FROM ad_groups WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT keyword_text FROM keywords WHERE ad_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, bid, status FROM ads WHERE group_id = 2 AND status = 'active' ORDER BY bid DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 1000 AND impressions > 500 ORDER BY ad_id, conversions DESC;
SELECT keyword_text FROM keywords WHERE ad_id = 5 AND keyword_text LIKE '%marketing%' ORDER BY id;
